description: A Large NYC Studio Aparment. Cosy Loft Style apartment is perfect oasis for you to come and get to see NYC. My place is close to Central Park Zoo, MET Museum, MOMA and only a short walk to the 6 train which takes you directly to Grand Central or anywhere Downtown (Soho, West Village and Chelsea) Close Retaurants include UVA, Panrose, The Supply House, Bareburger, Tanoshi Sushi Sake Bar and many more. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, business travelers, and families (with kids).
name: Modern Huge Studio with Foldout. Upper East Side.
